message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic product at a starting price of $13,500.  I believe you'll find this a very competitive offer considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 is significantly below its true value.  Let's meet in the middle - how about $11,500?
I understand that you're trying to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10,000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider this offer?
